info.title: Manual Contract Accruals â€“ Post (Synchronous)
info.description: This service enables you to post manual contract accruals that are relevant for revenue recognition processing. The cost or revenue adjustments are not changed by the Revenue Recognition Run. The adjustments are posted to extra accounts. When the stage of the project can be considered as completed, they are canceled by the next closing run. The service will group entries with the same WBS Element, Fiscal Period, Fiscal Year, and Ledger and only posts one document in the system.

x-sap-shortText: Post manual contract accruals using this synchronous inbound service

get.description: Posts manual contract accruals for projects that are relevant for revenue recognition processing

parameters.name: accrualDataJSON
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)
